trans-unit.source: Represents the exception that is thrown when the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"></xref> is not able to complete a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Send*> or <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendAsync*> operation.
trans-unit.target: Representa a exceção que é acionada quando o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient"> </xref> não é possível concluir uma <> </> *> ou <> </> *> operação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property contains the status code returned by the SMTP server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade contém o código de estado devolvido pelo servidor SMTP.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The exception returned by this constructor has its <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>.
trans-unit.target: A exceção devolvida por este construtor tem a respetiva <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode>.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com o código de estado especificada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor utiliza o `statusCode` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor utiliza o `message` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve o erro ocorreu.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified status code and error message.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com a mensagem de erro e código de estado especificada.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `statusCode` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A> property and uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza este construtor o `statusCode` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>propriedade e utiliza o `message` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException.StatusCode%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve o erro ocorreu.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe a partir de instâncias especificadas do <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> e <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>classes.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor implementa a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>interface para a <xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException>classe.</xref:System.Net.Mail.SmtpException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> que contém as informações necessárias para serializar o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the new instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém a origem e de destino de fluxo serializado associado com a nova instância.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref> class with the specified error message and inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref> classe com a erro especificado mensagem e a exceção interna.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor utiliza o `message` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade e o `innerException` parâmetro ao inicializar o <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: Se `innerException` não é `null`, a exceção atual num bloco catch que processa `innerException`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que descreve o erro ocorreu.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: A exceção é a causa da exceção atual.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer objetos incluídos a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>automaticamente registadas e serializado pelo formatador.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> para preencher com dados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que especifica o destino para esta serialização.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the status code returned by an SMTP server when an e-mail message is transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código de estado devolvido por um servidor de SMTP quando uma mensagem de correio eletrónico é transmitida.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"></xref> value that indicates the error that occurred.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpStatusCode"> </xref> valor que indica o erro ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Preenche um <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> instância com os dados necessários para serializar o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>, which holds the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>, que contém os dados serializados para o <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>que contém o destino de fluxo serializado associado com o novo <xref href="System.Net.Mail.SmtpException"> </xref>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
